data.expected_result: The emoji should render, albeit in its raw form (due to the old Twemoji version Discord uses)
data.short_description: Unicode 11 emojis don't render at all (they did on the 3rd of Oct)
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy a Unicode 11 emoji from somewhere (e.g. Emojipedia) - Paste it somewhere in the Discord client (chat box, roles, nicknames, etc.)
